name: GROWTH 2: The Growth Strikes Back (LD34)
description:
http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=34365

Forgot about LD34 until there was 6.5 hours to go for the compo. Went super sonic and threw this together. Woo!

There's an outbreak on Planet LD34. The Growth is back. It's up to you to hold them off. Your spaceship only has two buttons though, so we had to wire the accelerator and gun to your steering. Good luck!

Use single arrow keys to steer AND boost.
Use BOTH arrow keys to shoot.

How long can you hold off the Growth?

Thanks!

FermenterGames.com
